SELECT
, xcg.group_name data_group_name, xcg.group_path, iu.login_name publisher, hu.unit_name responsible_dept_name, he.email responsible_person_email, he.mobile responsible_person_tel, he.name responsible_person_name, he.employee_num responsible_person_code, xrd1.data_code parent_data_code, xrd1.data_name parent_data_name FROM xqua_reference_data xrd
LEFT JOIN xcor_common_group xcg ON xrd.data_group_id = xcg.group_id
LEFT JOIN iam_user iu ON xrd.release_by = iu.id
LEFT JOIN hpfm_unit hu ON xrd.responsible_dept_id = hu.unit_id
LEFT JOIN hpfm_employee he ON xrd.responsible_person_id = he.employee_id
LEFT JOIN xqua_reference_data xrd1 ON xrd.parent_data_id = xrd1.data_id WHERE xrd.data_id = #{dataId}
